actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Coinage Act of 1965 to change the size, weight, and design of the one-dollar coin, and for other purposes.
short_title: Susan B. Anthony Dollar Coin Act

summary.text: Susan B. Anthony Dollar Coin Act - Amends the Coinage Act of 1965 to change the size and weight of the one-dollar coin and to require that the obverse side of such coin bear the likeness of Susan B. Anthony.

titles.title: Susan B. Anthony Dollar Coin Act
A bill to amend the Coinage Act of 1965 to change the size, weight, and design of the one-dollar coin, and for other purposes.
